channel.title: Research Softwares on Boris Gailleton
channel.description: Recent content in Research Softwares on Boris Gailleton

item.title: Hydrodynamics
item.description: WebGL Lisflood sandbox for testing shallow-water responses straight in the browser.

item.title: LSDTopoTools / lsdtopytools
item.description: Graph-powered terrain analysis toolkit with a lightweight Python shim for scripted runs.

item.title: TopoToolbox
item.description: MATLAB-based geomorphometry suite we rely on for quick terrain sanity checks.

item.title: pyfastflow
item.description: Python bindings for the FastFlow solvers that drive our surface process experiments.

item.title: GraphFlood
item.description: Graph-based 2D flood approximator I co-developed for coupling rivers with landscape models.

item.title: FastScape
item.description: C++/Python landscape evolution kernel we use for almost every exploratory run.

item.title: Scabbard / DAGGER
item.description: Companion tools for DAGGER experiments that keep provenance and scenario trees tidy.
